artist: Artist: John Austen; Author: Alain-René Le Sage; Translator: Tobias Smollett, M.D.; Author: Introduction by J.B. Priestly; Printer: Oxford University Press, Oxford, England; Publisher: The Limited Editions Club
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: Two volumes. Binding: Half grey linen, gold stamped lettering, blue linen sides, blue paper dust jacket with designs and lettering printed in blue and black; endpapers: white laid printed with pattern in black, grey and blue; slipcase: white laid paper over cardboard, printed pattern in black, grey and blue (matches endpaper) Cereen paper label printed in black and blue affixed (slightly damaged); type: monotype fournier; 740 pp.
inscription:
Signature and Edition
in back, top edge dyed grey
title: The Adventures of Gil Blas of Santillane
